column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Had a Lettuce Entertain You gift card. Decided to use it by coming here for happy hour. Ordered a pitcher of sangria and a few tapas dishes. The sangria tasted watered down. Honestly we make better sangria at home. The tapas dishes were generic and mediocre. While they weren't bad
column2: nothing really stood out. Most items were very greasy and over salted. Service was decent. Food came out super fast. Don't get why so many people come here. Personally
column3: I would not come back here again.
